description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix application using React and Node.js. It handles incoming HTTP requests, distinguishes between bot and browser requests, and manages server-side rendering with streaming responses.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main exported function that handles incoming HTTP requests and routes them based on user agent, applying CORS headers and managing server-side rendering.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from bots by rendering the React application server-side and streaming the response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from browsers similarly to handleBotRequest but triggered when the user agent isn't identified as a bot.
